short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces Teacher with Coach, Student with Learner and Guardian with Line manager

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the role names in the Classroom 'People' interface. Useful for professional learning scenarios outside of a school environment.
